name: hex wizard
description:
*sound recommended on both mobile and pc :)*

Welcome wizard!

Hone your spell casting skills with hex wizard. Check back weekly to see the weekly star chart to get another piece of world of hex wizard!

Go to settings -> Custom game mode to change the game and the art!

If you are on phone consider going to settings ->mobile friendly [on]

I really really wanted to try to make a game that was just pleasant to play during this time in my life where there is a lot of unpleasantness. Thanks to Emma for playtesting it like a gagillion times <3. You are so unbelievable patient. Thanks to everyone else that I sent this too when I got anxious at night. I am so lucky to have the best friends in the world.

HOW TO PLAY:

click on hex to start a path, drag with mouse or finger to adjacent hexes to make path longer, you can only drag to hexes of the same color. 

RULES OF PLAY: DOTS Mode:

1) 1 pt per hex cleared
2) form a loop to clear all hexes of the loop's color
3) you are a wizard making constellations in the sky

CUSTOM:

1) each hex you connect is 1 pt.
2) +1 (+ 3 if path > 3) point if you end your path where you started
3) when you make a loop, +5 for each different type of hex inside the loop
4) you are a wizard terraforming the world around you
